title: Drawing, "Lavatory installation - drawing of sink and counter materials, (3 views)", March 11, 1949
markings: Stamped in black ink, lower right: ROUGH SKETCH / HENRY DREYFUSS 969 SAN PASQUALE STREET, PASADENA 5, CAL. / 501 MADISON AVENUE, NEW YORK 22, N. Y.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, left center: TILE / CEMENT / LAV. / CHANNEL TO PROTECT / PLYWOOD / 8 LAV. FASTNERS / 1; center: ¾” PLYWOOD / FORMICA / STAINLESS / VINYL OR CAVLK / LAV / CLAMPS / 2; right center: MARBLE / CAVLK &/OR / VINYL GASKET / LAV. / 3; lower right: DW6 #C69-4 / 3-11-49 / CRANE - LAV. INSTALLATION.
description: Three sketches of possible sink designs

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lavatory installation - drawing of sink and counter materials, (3 views)", March 11, 1949.
March 11, 1949. Graphite on off-white tracing paper. Gift of Henry Dreyfuss. 1972-88-341.
